This is a story about freedom, rebirth and corporate irresponsibility. But most importantly — this is a lesson about the importance of decentralization. Reddit had, once again disappointed its user […]

articles.author: Andrei
articles.description:
Cryptocurrency Exchange Poloniex had its wallets drained in the second biggest Cryptocurrency hack of 2023. Over 4900 ETH were siphoned from Poloniex’s Hot Wallet 4 by the attacker and distributed across multiple accomplice wallets. The attackers seem to have timed this attack around the recent pump in the market, possibly to try and siphon as […]
The post Poloniex Crypto Exchange Just Hacked For Over $114 Million - A Post-mortem appeared first on cryptomaton.
articles.title: Poloniex Crypto Exchange Just Hacked For Over $114 Million - A Post-mortem
